title: Michelangelo
content:
Are you looking for information about the Renaissance artist [Michelangelo Buonarroti](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232524/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Michelangelo%20Buonarroti)?

This is the wiki-entry for **Michelangelo** , a typeface designed during the 1950s by [Hermann Zapf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232524/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hermann%20Zapf) for [D. Stempel AG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232524/http:/typophile.com/wiki/D.%20Stempel%20AG). Please see the [Palatino](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328232524/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Palatino) entry for more information.
author: dan_reynolds
